# A unique educational immersive experience inside a diseased human heart

Experience the transformative power of XR in medical education. We are thrilled to introduce an experience that merges 3D medical art with medical knowledge through an immersive platform. Make learning more intuitive and engaging.

{1135196634404871}


# Hold a realistic beating human heart in your hands

Understand heart attacks and their causes. Immerse yourself in the microscopic world, interact with the heart as it anatomically sits in the chest. See how the ECG’s translates its electrical activity, in life-saving wave patterns.

{397958826599965}


# A heart attack can strike without warning, but the heart leaves a trail of clues

Demystify the critical role of ECGs in diagnosing heart attacks. Understand how an ECG reads the heart’s electrical activity to help diagnose a heart attack. Discover why the ECG is an essential tool in modern medicine.

{996487508614258}

# Turn your room into a diseased blood vessel

The experience provides an immersive look at the process of cholesterol plaque build-up and their progression, see how cholesterol plaques form in blood vessels, why they become unstable, and how this can lead to a heart attack.

{407682235610677}


# Disclaimer
 This is purely educational and not a medical tool,  is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay seeking it because of something learned from this experience. In a medical emergency, contact your doctor or emergency services immediately.
